default.name: Moderate User Approvals
default.msg: This is an optional menu item for accessing Community Builder user approval moderation. Normally not needed, as you would normally use Community Builder workflow module for this so it adapts automatically to login state.

state.name: Community Builder Moderate User Approvals
state.description: This is an optional menu item for accessing Community Builder user approval moderation. Normally not needed, as you would normally use Community Builder workflow module for this so it adapts automatically to login state.
